solution_line_template: There are a total of {initial_boys} + {added_boy} = <<{initial_boys}+{added_boy}={total_boys}>>{total_boys} boys in the class.
Hence, there are a total of {total_boys} boys + {girls} girls = <<{total_boys}+{girls}={total_students}>>{total_students} students in a class.
So {girls}/{total_students} x {percentage_multiplier}% = <<{girls}/{total_students} x {percentage_multiplier}% = {percentage_girls}>>{percentage_girls}% of the class are girls.
